products.title: Devon Shadow Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Taking influence from soft cloth fabric weaves, their devon range of roller blinds provide a stunning textured finish for your window dressing. Shadow grey is a beautiful soft grey shade. An on trend shade, ideal for modern interiors.
